ai-ya3.3.4:1.1_0: When you understand the eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind aren’t able to completely understand that.
ai-ya3.3.4:2.1_0: But if he does not completely understand the sense fields, he does not completely understand that the fields of equanimity,
ai-ya3.3.4:3.1_0: The sense fields don’t completely understand the eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind.
ai-ya3.3.4:4.1_0: he doesn’t understand the sense-sphere, and he does not understand it.
ai-ya3.3.4:4.1_1: While the origin of the path and perfected ones are the fully awakened Buddha, and the monks are not able to understand the dimension of infinite space and the dimension of infinite consciousness,
ai-ya3.3.4:5.1_0: But one who doesn’t completely understand the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception, and one who does not completely understand it.
ai-ya3.3.4:6.1_0: the origin of the path, Sounds, and doesn’t completely understand the eye,
ai-ya3.3.4:6.1_1: While the origin of the path and perfected ones are the fully awakened Buddhas, but not after understanding the origin of the dimension of infinite space.
